info.summary: Create a VM based on devel:kanku:images Leap 15.1

info.summary: Create a VM based on devel:kanku:images Leap 15.4
info.description:
This KanuFile downloads a minimal Leap 15.4 image from 
devel:kanku:images and creates a VM

This KankuFile does the following steps:
  * download the dki image file
  * create a VM
  * do a ssh connection test to the newly created VM

Enjoy YLWK!
